p: Monteiro DCS contributed to the study design, data collection, analyzed and interpreted data. Cavalcanti LPG and Colares JKB assisted with the design of the study survey, data interpretation and manuscript reviews. Ara√∫jo FMC assisted with data interpretation, and manuscript writing and review. Martins VEP and Ramalho ILC reviewed the manuscript. Souza NV, Amaral JC and Lima KB participated in the conceptualization of the study, data collection and manuscript reviews. Lima DM conceived the study, participated in the study design, coordination, and reviewed the manuscript. All authors read and approved the final version of the manuscript.
